# writingDirectionBased

**Type Property**

The alignment following the writing direction of the same paragraph.

## Declaration

```swift
static let writingDirectionBased: Text.AlignmentStrategy
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/multilineTextAlignment] is [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextAlignment/leading], alignment follows the writing direction. If the value is [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextAlignment/trailing] alignment is the opposite of the writing direction and finally, a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextAlignment/center] value always results in centered alignment.
